derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Greek lexikos 'of words' (from lexis 'word') + -al

entry.def: Lexical means relating to the words of a language.

example.ex: We chose a few of the commonest lexical items in the languages.
example.tran: 我们选取了各语言中最常见的几个词汇。
